actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of law relating to the private carriage of letters, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of the postal law relating to the private carriage of letters. (Repeals 39 U.S.C. 601, 602; 18 U.S.C. 1694 - 1697; Amends 18 U.S.C. 1698 - 1699)

titles.title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of law relating to the private carriage of letters, and for other purposes.
